content.rendered:
Infrastructure as code, pipelines as code, wow, we even have code as code!

In this webinar, Erik Osterman from Cloud Posse shows you how they build and deploy applications with Terraform using GitOps with Codefresh. Cloud Posse is a power user of Terraform with over 120 Terraform modules developed.  Eric shares how we handle automation with security while making the process easy for engineers.

Watch the full webinar here

Terraform GitOps on Codefresh from Codefresh
